title: Perfect Greenwich Village Four Bedroom/ Two Baths
posting_body: ['70 University Pl 4 New York, NY  10003', '$10999.00 / Month', '---------------------------', 'Interested in this property?', 'Reply to this listing for more information.', '---------------------------', 'Property Details:', '4 BEDROOMS | 2 BATHROOMS', 'This lovely gut-renovated, floor-through 4 bedroom/ 2 baths is available for an August 1st move in.', 'Located in the heart of the beautiful Greenwich Village, this apartment is one of a kind!', 'Featuring sleek finishes, crown moldings, dishwasher and washer/ dryer – you’ll have everything you and three roommates could possibly need while enjoying one of the most desirable locations in New York City.', 'Washington Square Park, Union Square, NYU and Sant Marks Place are all within a few minutes walk of this wonderful University Pl address.', 'Enjoy an outdoor space shared only with your next door neighbor where you can garden, tan, or have dinner parties.', 'You’ll be only two flights up and have a virtual doorman for your security and convenience.', 'Contact us via phone, text or email for an exclusive viewing today!', 'Video available upon request.', '***Small Dogs, Cats, Large Dogs Allowed***', 'Property Type:', 'Single Family', 'Lease Terms:', '$10999.00/Month', '$10999.00 Deposit', 'Lease Length:', 'One Year', 'Available:', '08/01/2022', 'Unit Amenities:', 'Dishwasher', 'Dryer', 'Freezer', 'Microwave', 'Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Washer', 'Building Amenities:', 'Accessibility Features', 'Alarm System', 'Bicycle Parking', 'Cable Ready', 'Fenced Yard', 'Near Parks', 'Washer Dryer Hookups', 'Intercom', 'Off Street Parking', 'On Site Laundry', 'Secure Building', 'Security Cameras', 'Wired For Internet', 'Fireplace', '---------------------------', 'Interested in this property?', 'Reply to this listing for more information.']
